title: Leaver Buster Resets?
body:
Hey! I was wondering about how long until the leaver buster penalties go down or reset?
Story if anyone's interested :P 
So previously I've had a string of events which lead to a few minutes of being AFK, I admit it isn't good but when your isp dies or your computer all of a sudden has a heart attack there's nothing I can do.  The first low priority queues were reasonable but after 20+ games of not having a single problem I had to leave for 5 minutes because someone who was trying to sell their paintings came knocking on the door. After going back in closing out the game I had no idea I have to wait 20 minutes before my next five games. 
I love this game but i honestly feel like quitting if I have to put up with this ;_;

replies.body:
They gradually decrase over the course of completed games.
They do not reset after 5, even one is enough to start the decay - but there is no fixed reset point. The more you were leaving before, the more you'll have to play before the system resets.
They reset after 5 games, time is not a factor.
